features: One 100.5 fl oz bottle of ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean with Odor Blasters Laundry Detergent, Fresh Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent cleans 77 medium loads when used as directed
Triple-power HE laundry detergent fights tough odors, blasts away stains and boosts freshness so your clothes look and smell their best
With trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda plus an odor fighter, this HE laundry detergent is formulated to deeply clean clothes and deliver lasting freshness
Laundry stain remover forces out stubborn stains and nasty odors using OxiClean Stain Fighters to remove stains like food, grass, grease and more
Odor Blasters fights tough smells like body odor, sweat and musty towels and leave clothes with a lasting Fresh Burst scent
body.description: ARM & HAMMER Plus OxiClean with Odor Blasters Liquid Laundry Detergent is ideal for standard and High Efficiency (HE) washers. This concentrated laundry detergent boasts triple power: it fights tough odors, blasts away stains and boosts freshness. Concentrated with 3X powerful odor fighters in every load versus the leading value detergent, this HE detergent handles your toughest loads in all wash temperatures, even cold water. OxiClean Stain fighters and Odor Blasters power away stains and fight tough odors like body odor, sweat and musty towels. Infuse a long-lasting fresh burst when you use this laundry detergent and odor remover. Blended with trusted ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda, this laundry soap is tough on odors, dirt and stains, leaving clothes clean and smelling fresh. For standard bottles, fill the cap to Bar A for medium-sized loads, or use half a capful for energy-saving cold water cycles compared to washing in warm water. Add a full cap of this detergent to large or heavily soiled loads to fight tough odors and remove microscopic stains and dirt for a hygienic clean. For larger dispenser sizes, fill to the top of Line C for medium loads. For large or heavily soiled loads, use half a capful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Well worth the money. Scent is amazing too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous ordering this because of all the reviews saying it came in all beat up and the lids broken. But thankfully it came in perfect condition! They also put a long piece of sturdy tape over the lid to protect it during shipping so that gave me peace of mind seeing that! I haven't used it yet although I'm sure it works great on stains. It does smell amazing! Edit: Had to come back and say that washing my laundry now makes my whole house smell amazing!! Not only that but this stuff is no joke on stains! I got pizza oil/grease all over my new hoodie. It removed it! I had a towel that was stained for over a year. Now it's gone! This stuff really blows my mind!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I used to use GAIN.
reviews.reviewText: I used to use Gain but only bc the good lasting smell, I used this a cpl years ago an never turned back. This not only leaves a good clean smell on the clothing but it actually cleans them too!! My boyfriend works with concrete everyday, it gets his clothes clean, where as gain didn't really clean them. I recommend it. Along with the clean burst dryer sheets!! delivery was within a week, even tho I pay for prime free 2 day shipping, I never get anything in less than a week. Ever. I figured they would just sent the jug of detergent, but they put it in a Amazon box. Lol I felt that was honestly a waste of a box and the bubble wrap. But never the less, packaging was great! Useless and wasteful... but great.. Lol (also,no leaks!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Detergent
reviews.reviewText: This is the best laundry detergent that I have used thus far!! I have gone through several different brands. It’s gets the clothes very clean, and the smell is amazing. With last detergents, I always found myself using a lot of detergent bc the clothes would still be coming out with stains and odor. Then I started issuing multiple things in my laundry just to make it smell better. The scent booster beads, fabrics softener, etc. With Arm&Hammer I don’t have to use any of that. Just the detergent and a small amount of at that and the clothes come out exceptionally clean every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! This is my new favorite laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: After 45+ years of faithfully using what I thought was the best laundry detergent (Tide) I have switched to this one. It really works that well, and it costs less. I bought it the first time on a whim because of the lower price on Amazon, satisfaction with other Arm & Hammer products and plain old curiosity. So glad I did that! I've been using this Arm & Hammer detergent for 4 months now, and it has consistently eliminated stains and odors even from my teenage grand son's dirty socks. I quickly recommended it to my daughter and daughter-in-law, and they love it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Game-changer in my laundry routine
reviews.reviewText: I recently switched to Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Odor Blasters Fresh Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent, and it has truly been a game-changer in my laundry routine.The Fresh Burst scent is delightful and leaves my clothes smelling clean and invigorating. What I appreciate most is its effectiveness in tackling tough odors. Whether it's sweaty gym clothes or stubborn food smells, this detergent lives up to its Odor Blasters claim, leaving my laundry smelling remarkably fresh.With the capacity to handle 128 loads, this detergent offers excellent value for money. A little goes a long way, providing powerful cleaning action while still being gentle on fabrics. It effectively removes stains and brightens colors, maintaining the vibrancy of my clothes over time.The added OxiClean component is a standout feature. It enhances the detergent's stain-fighting power, ensuring that even the most stubborn stains are lifted. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall cleanliness and appearance of my laundry since making the switch.The convenient and easy-to-use bottle design, along with the mess-free pour spout, adds to the overall positive experience. It's hassle-free and ensures that I use just the right amount for each load.Furthermore, the compatibility of this detergent with high-efficiency (HE) washing machines is a major plus. It produces low suds, promoting efficient cleaning without causing any issues with my machine.In summary, Arm & Hammer Plus OxiClean Odor Blasters Fresh Burst has become my go-to laundry detergent. It not only delivers on its promise of odor elimination but also provides a reliable and cost-effective solution for all my laundry needs. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to refresh their laundry routine with a high-performance detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells SO good!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried so many laundry detergents trying to find the best combo of good fragrance that lasts and that packs a punch against two teen boys dirty laundry. This one was the answer and so affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s my old stand by detergent. Works well and smells great
